2+1.sig_info: Sunspot increases his maximum number of Solar Charges by 1 to 30.

SOLAR CHARGES - MAX STACKS: 80: Sunspot is Immune to all Incinerate effects. Whenever Sunspot would be incinerated he instead generates 5 Solar Charges.
Sunspot starts a fight with his maximum Solar Charges. 1 charge expires every 3 second(s).
FLARE STATE - MAX STACKS: 10: Sunspot maintains Flare State for as long as he has Solar Charges.
If under the effects of Shock or when running out of Solar Charges, Flare State is disabled and all stacks are removed.
Whenever Sunspot’s attacks make contact with his Opponent he expends 1 Solar Charge per hit for each stack of Flare State. Each charge expended increases the damage of that hit by 41.
ON WELL-TIMED BLOCKS: For as long as Sunspot’s Opponent is Incinerated, Well-Timed blocks grant 100% Perfect Block chance for the duration of his Opponents Combo or Special Attack.
When Sunspot performs a Perfect Block he Purifies 1 Incinerate Debuff on his Opponent.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: While Charging a Heavy Attack, Sunspot Purifies 1 Incinerate Debuff on his Opponent every 0.18 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Gain an additional stack of Flare State.
Incinerates inflicted during this Special Attack last 9 seconds longer.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The final hit expends up to 15 Solar Charges.
For each stack of Flare State, Sunspot gains a Prowess effect increasing the damage dealt by this Special Attack by 200%
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Sunspot recovers up to his maximum Solar Charges.
For every 20 Solar Charges recovered Sunspot Inflicts 1 Incinerate Debuff dealing 82 Energy Damage over 12 seconds.

SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The final hit expends up to 15 Solar Charges.
For each stack of Flare State, Sunspot gains a Prowess effect increasing the damage dealt by this Special Attack by 200%
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Sunspot recovers up to his maximum Solar Charges.
For every 20 Solar Charges recovered Sunspot Inflicts 1 Incinerate Debuff dealing 2377 Energy Damage over 12 seconds.

6+3.sig_info: Sunspot increases his maximum number of Solar Charges by 1 to 40.

SOLAR CHARGES - MAX STACKS: 80: Sunspot is Immune to all Incinerate effects. Whenever Sunspot would be incinerated he instead generates 5 Solar Charges.
Sunspot starts a fight with his maximum Solar Charges. 1 charge expires every 3 second(s).
FLARE STATE - MAX STACKS: 10: Sunspot maintains Flare State for as long as he has Solar Charges.
If under the effects of Shock or when running out of Solar Charges, Flare State is disabled and all stacks are removed.
Whenever Sunspot’s attacks make contact with his Opponent he expends 1 Solar Charge per hit for each stack of Flare State. Each charge expended increases the damage of that hit by 1381.
ON WELL-TIMED BLOCKS: For as long as Sunspot’s Opponent is Incinerated, Well-Timed blocks grant 100% Perfect Block chance for the duration of his Opponents Combo or Special Attack.
When Sunspot performs a Perfect Block he Purifies 1 Incinerate Debuff on his Opponent.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: While Charging a Heavy Attack, Sunspot Purifies 1 Incinerate Debuff on his Opponent every 0.18 seconds.

SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Sunspot recovers up to his maximum Solar Charges.

FLARE STATE - MAX STACKS: 10: Sunspot maintains Flare State for as long as he has Solar Charges.
If under the effects of Shock or when running out of Solar Charges, Flare State is disabled and all stacks are removed.
Whenever Sunspot’s attacks make contact with his Opponent he expends 1 Solar Charge per hit for each stack of Flare State. Each charge expended increases the damage of that hit by 1547.
ON WELL-TIMED BLOCKS: For as long as Sunspot’s Opponent is Incinerated, Well-Timed blocks grant 100% Perfect Block chance for the duration of his Opponents Combo or Special Attack.
When Sunspot performs a Perfect Block he Purifies 1 Incinerate Debuff on his Opponent.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: While Charging a Heavy Attack, Sunspot Purifies 1 Incinerate Debuff on his Opponent every 0.18 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Gain an additional stack of Flare State.
Incinerates inflicted during this Special Attack last 9 seconds longer.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The final hit expends up to 15 Solar Charges.
For each stack of Flare State, Sunspot gains a Prowess effect increasing the damage dealt by this Special Attack by 200%
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Sunspot recovers up to his maximum Solar Charges.
For every 20 Solar Charges recovered Sunspot Inflicts 1 Incinerate Debuff dealing 3094 Energy Damage over 12 seconds.

SOLAR CHARGES - MAX STACKS: 80: Sunspot is Immune to all Incinerate effects. Whenever Sunspot would be incinerated he instead generates 5 Solar Charges.
Sunspot starts a fight with his maximum Solar Charges. 1 charge expires every 3 second(s).
FLARE STATE - MAX STACKS: 10: Sunspot maintains Flare State for as long as he has Solar Charges.
If under the effects of Shock or when running out of Solar Charges, Flare State is disabled and all stacks are removed.
Whenever Sunspot’s attacks make contact with his Opponent he expends 1 Solar Charge per hit for each stack of Flare State. Each charge expended increases the damage of that hit by 32.
INCINERATES: When Striking the Opponent, inflict an Incinerate for each Solar Charge expended, dealing 6.4 energy damage for 5 seconds.
Incinerates remove Perfect Block chance and lower the Opponents Block Proficiency by 50%.
If a Strike fails to apply an Incinerate on the Opponent due to chance, or whenever any Incinerate is Purified, gain 10% of a bar of Power and 1 Solar Charge.
As Sunspot gains Power the potency of any Power gained by Incinerates is reduced by up to 57%.
ON WELL-TIMED BLOCKS: For as long as Sunspot’s Opponent is Incinerated, Well-Timed blocks grant 100% Perfect Block chance for the duration of his Opponents Combo or Special Attack.
When Sunspot performs a Perfect Block he Purifies 1 Incinerate Debuff on his Opponent.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: While Charging a Heavy Attack, Sunspot Purifies 1 Incinerate Debuff on his Opponent every 0.18 seconds.

SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Sunspot recovers up to his maximum Solar Charges.
